items.sentence: The child I was trying to help started crying.
Would you like for me to teach you how to sew?
I'll rely on my father for half of my tuition.
I'll get around to doing that sooner or later.
I'll tell Tom to do that if I don't forget to.
I'll wait until you've finished your homework.
I'll make sure that Tom never does that again.
I'll see if I can get Tom to agree to do that.
We need to know everything you know about Tom.
We need to pay back the money that we owe Tom.
